title: ENLIGHTEN (Talk by ISRO Mission Director)
description: With the development of India's first indigenously built satellite Aryabhatta and the Chandrayaan missions, ISRO hasreached remarkable milestones all the way to Mangalyaan and the record breaking PSLV launch that carried 104 satellites. To get a better understanding of India's space programme and its future challenges, we had Mr. T K Sundaramurthy, the former Mission Director at ISRO, speaking on The Indian Space Program: Past, Present and Future
